metadata.Title: CVE-2022-32745 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in Samba. Samba AD users can cause the server to access uninitialized data with an LDAP add or modify the request, usually resulting in a segmentation fault.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> combined patches are in bug 15096 Fixing this in Ubuntu 18.04 LTS would require substantial code backports. We will not be fixing this issue in Ubuntu 18.04 LTS. In environments where this is of concern, we recommend updating to a more recent Ubuntu version.

criterions.comment: samba: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
